speaker.whotheyare: Massimo Russo is a senior partner emeritus at BCG and a former fellow of the BCG Henderson Institute.
speaker.whylisten: Massimo Russo has spent his career advising clients on technology-enabled strategy and led BCG's technology advantage practice. Prior to BCG, he led the "DetroyYourBusiness.com" team at GE Aviation. He began his career in product development and holds patents in areas such as medical stents, 3D printing and hot dog manufacturing machines. He serves on the advisory board of an MIT SaaS AI company. He holds a BS and MS in mechanical engineering from MIT and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
